content: I do not have access to location information. however, you can search for licensed acupuncturists near your area using online directories such as the national certification commission for acupuncture and oriental medicine (nccaom) or the american association of acupuncture and oriental medicine (aaaom). you can also ask for recommendations from your healthcare provider or from friends and family who have had success with acupuncture. it is essential to ensure that the acupuncturist you select is licensed and has experience in treating menopause symptoms.
